com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom
Class VertexBufferArray.BufferedVertex

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom.VertexBufferArray.BufferedVertex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vertex
Enclosing class:
VertexBufferArray
protected class VertexBufferArray.BufferedVertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vertex

Class that implements the Vertex interface and acts as a proxy to the data stored in the buffer. This allows the caller to avoid knowledge of the buffer storage format.
